mapper.insert: insert into tbl_highfive (hno, receiver, sender, flag, senddate ) values (#{hno},#{receiver},#{sender},#{flag},#{senddate})
mapper.select: select hno, receiver, sender, flag, senddate from tbl_highfive where hno=#{hno}
